name: 7.15 "Don't Paint Your Chickens" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did Woody say the girl could punch in the stomach?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam let a girl punch him in the stomach to prove how fit he was. Woody didn't buy it so Sam told him to try it. Woody asked the girl out, she said no. He said, "what if I let you punch this guy in the stomach." Sam explained how it worked and Woody laughed at the idea of letting someone punch him in the stomach.

an ink spot.

	Rebecca said she brought her lucky fountain pen. Sam pointed to the spot and said "your leaky fountain pen".

questions.text: What patron hasn't had a job in 3 months?
questions.explanation:
Norm & Norman.

	Norm was an accountant but because of his poor work habits (like not showing up to work) he was always getting fired. He was also a painter but had not found work in that area either.

questions.text: Who helped this patron promote his business?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca said that she knew about business but no way to apply it. Then when it was pointed out Norm had been out of work she decided to promote him so he would have some work.

questions.text: What did the company get named?
questions.explanation:
4-A painting.

	Rebecca said that it was an advertising trick to get their name in the phone book first. However, it did have its flaws. People mixed it up for AAA the Auto Club.

questions.text: What is the mascot for this company?
questions.explanation:
chameleon.

	Rebecca picked the chameleon because of its ability to change its colors. Since a painter changes the color of what he paints this was a good mascot.

questions.text: What was the name of the mascot?
questions.explanation:
Carl.

	Norm thought that Rebecca was getting out of hand and went into the office to tell her. He was making wild animal sounds to sound tough and this led to them finding the voice for Carl.

questions.text: Who did Rebecca say started with "one little hamburger"?
questions.explanation:
Ray Kroc.

	Ray Kroc did not found McDonald's, he bought the company from the McDonald's before it grew into a big restaurant so he was the name mostly associated with McDonald's.  Dave Thomas founded Wendy's. David Egerton co-founded Burger King. Carl Karcher founded Carl's Jr.

questions.text: What did Rebecca say was her motto?
questions.explanation:
"Just do it, babe."

	She told them that "women on the rise make calls they don't take calls." Norm expected like everything Rebecca did 4-A painting would result in failure as well.

questions.text: Who was lying on the ground outside of Cheers when Rebecca left?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam was trying to impress a younger woman by trying to keep up with her. However, she wiped him out and he just couldn't move anymore so he laid on the floor outside of the bar. Rebecca just stepped over him, leaving him there.
